org.actus.conventions.endofmonth

Interface EndOfMonthConvention

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EndOfMonth, SameDay

    public interface EndOfMonthConvention
    Component that represents a certain end of month day convention

    Different conventions of how to handle the situation when creating a ContractEvent date schedule (cf. ScheduleFactory) starting at an end-of-month day exist. E.g. if the start date of the schedule falls on the 30st of April, do we really mean to create a schedule of dates of the 30st of each month or do we mean to use the last day in each month.

    Note that the end of month convention only applies to date schedules created using a 1M-cycle or a multiple thereof. In particular, any cycle with period unit D or W is not considered a multiple of 1M (even if it is 4W) while any cycle with period unit M, Q, H, and Y is considered a multiple.

    Make sure, new conventions implement this interface when adding to the library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalDateTime shift(LocalDateTime date)
      Shift a date to the end of the month according to a specific convention
